description: Ash`s Torterra was revealed during the Japanese opening `The Greatest-Everyday!`. It evolved during a battle against Rocket Gang when they commandeered Nagisa Tower. Denji`s Raichu and Satoshi`s Pikachu were injured by Rocket Gang and in order to protect them it used its new move Leaf Storm which it learned after evolving.
name: Dodaitose (Satoshi)
